## 🌍 Introduction

> Despite remarkable progress in global vaccination coverage, millions remain vulnerable—highlighting persistent disparities in healthcare access and economic development.

From 2000 to 2023:
- Global vaccination coverage rose from **65% to 85%**
- Life expectancy increased from **68 to 76 years**
